Description.Value: Collection of useful utilities and gameplay enhancements: Remote Control buff (1 AP + 1 WP), Recruit inventory settings, Return fire improvements (angle, limit, step-out), Always recover all items from tactical missions, Aircraft configuration (speed, capacity, range), Vehicle space configuration (Armadillo, Scarab, Aspida, Kaos space in aircraft/squad). Quality-of-life improvements extracted from SuperCheatsModPlus with 6 working features.
